name: Stephen LATHROP and Karen A. Lathrop, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of and on Behalf of Joseph S. Lathrop, a Minor, Appellants, v. Jason T. RUGGIANO and Northwestern Institute of Psychiatry, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
935 A.2d 1273
Stephen LATHROP and Karen A. Lathrop, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of and on Behalf of Joseph S. Lathrop, a Minor, Appellants, v. Jason T. RUGGIANO and Northwestern Institute of Psychiatry, Appellees.
